activities.name: Search for Water
activities.description: Explore Martian terrain to locate potential water sources for future colonization.

activities.name: Find Shelter
activities.description: Engage in a simulated scenario to locate suitable locations for building shelters on Mars.

activities.name: Red Planet Rover Expedition
activities.description: Embark on a rover expedition to study Mars' surface and collect valuable data for research.

activities.name: Mars Photography Contest
activities.description: Capture breathtaking images of Mars' landscape and enter the photography contest.
